item.title: msaenet 3.1.2 and a sparse survival modeling example
item.description: Father-Son Tennis. Photo by Lucas Davies. I’m pleased to announce that msaenet 3.1.2 is now available on CRAN. You can install msaenet with: install.packages("msaenet") If you frequently build sparse linear models, msaenet can help you generate more parsimonious solutions with adaptive estimations. It supports any number of adaptive estimation steps, flexible initialization methods, multiple model selection criteria, and automatic parallel parameter tuning. New color palette This is a more focused update compared to the 3.
